text.more:
This network describes the cooperation relations of private equities and venture capitals in China from 2010 to 2019. 
Each node is an investor. 
Eash directed straight-line edge means a leader-follower relation between two investors in investment events. 
The arc edge of a node represents the sole-investment events, i.e. no followers.
A node is larger (and green) when it has more followers. 
Cooperation is frequent among clustered nodes and rare among separated nodes.
We can easily see a cluster of foreign funds at the bottom left corner (IDG, Sequoia, MatrixPartners),
while there is another cluster of funds with a government leader (Shenzhen Capital Group).
There are more interesting insights waiting for you to explore.
text.title: Cooperation Relations of Private Equities and Venture Capitals in China from 2010 to 2019
